summary: Completed frontend testing of ColdIQ landing page updates and tier-based feature access. Landing page stats (47%, 125K+, 2,400+), Data Points section, and Product Screenshots section all verified. Starter user analysis correctly shows unlocked Starter features and locked Pro features with 'Unlock with Pro' CTAs. Free user tier info displays correctly but History modal doesn't show locked features with upgrade CTAs.

issues: History modal for Free users doesn't show locked Starter+ and Pro+ metrics sections with 'Unlock with Starter/Pro' CTAs. The sections are hidden entirely instead of showing locked state. This is inconsistent with the Analyzer page which shows locked features with upgrade CTAs.

passed_tests: Landing page hero stats show 47% (Avg Response Increase)
Landing page hero stats show 125K+ (Emails Analyzed)
Landing page hero stats show 2,400+ (Active Users)
Landing page shows 'Trusted by 2,400+ Sales Teams' badge
Landing page shows '47% better response rates' text in hero
Landing page Data Points section shows Response Rate: 2.1% → 3.5% (+67%)
Landing page Data Points section shows Open Rate: 18% → 32% (+78%)
Landing page Data Points section shows Avg Score: 45 → 71 (+58%)
Landing page Data Points section shows Days to Reply: 5.2 → 2.8 (-46%)
Landing page Product Screenshots section exists with 'See It In Action' header
Landing page Product Screenshots section shows 'AI Analysis in Seconds' heading
Landing page Product Screenshots shows 'Analysis Score' mockup card
Landing page Product Screenshots shows 'Deep Metrics' mockup card
Landing page Product Screenshots shows 'AI Rewrite' mockup card
Landing page Product Screenshots section is positioned ABOVE Testimonials section
Starter user: Readability feature UNLOCKED (showing score and level)
Starter user: Spam Detection feature UNLOCKED (showing risk % and keywords)
Starter user: Subject Line Analysis feature UNLOCKED (showing effectiveness, length, indicators)
Starter user: CTA Analysis feature UNLOCKED (showing presence, clarity, type, friction)
Starter user: Fix This feature UNLOCKED (showing issues with priority)
Starter user: AI Subject Variants shows LOCKED with 'Unlock with Pro →' CTA
Starter user: Inbox Placement Score shows LOCKED with 'Unlock with Pro →' CTA
Starter user: Emotional Tone Analysis shows LOCKED with 'Unlock with Pro →' CTA
Starter user: Industry Benchmarks shows LOCKED with 'Unlock with Pro →' CTA
Starter user: A/B Test Ideas shows LOCKED with 'Unlock with Pro →' CTA
Free user: Dashboard shows correct usage (0 remaining, 3/3)
Free user: Analyzer page shows 'Your plan: Free' with upgrade message
action_items: OPTIONAL: Update History.jsx to show locked Starter+ and Pro+ metrics sections for Free users with 'Unlock with Starter/Pro' CTAs (currently these sections are hidden entirely for Free users, which is inconsistent with the Analyzer page behavior)
critical_code_review_comments: History.jsx lines 454 and 580: The Starter+ and Pro+ metrics sections use conditional rendering (isStarter && and isPro &&) which hides them entirely for lower tiers. Consider showing LockedFeatureCard components instead for consistency with Analyzer.jsx
seed_data_creation: Used existing test accounts from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Landing page updates verified: stats changed to 47%/125K+/2,400+, Product Screenshots section added above Testimonials with 3 mockups (Analysis Score, Deep Metrics, AI Rewrite). Tier-based feature access in Analyzer page working correctly - Starter users see unlocked Starter features and locked Pro features with 'Unlock with Pro' CTAs. Free user has exhausted their 3 free analyses (0 remaining). Minor inconsistency: History modal hides Starter+/Pro+ sections for lower tiers instead of showing locked state with upgrade CTAs.
